Using Functions

function: a set of instructions grouped together

"Calling" a function

tells the computer to run the instructions grouped in that function

What calling a function looks like

alert();

Let's try it

We just tried:

  • alert();
  • alert;
  • alert.toString();

Let's try some other functions

We just tried:

  • cecil.moveRandom();
  • cecil.moveRandom;
  • cecil.moveRandom.toString();

Let's what else we can tell Cecil to do!

Typing in cecil. will show you.

What if you want to move Cecil to a specific place?

Try cecil.move().
